TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Window/MdiHelpButton extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Window::MdiHelpButton abstract sealed

summary.span: Provides objects for each state of the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window.

span.span: Provides objects for each state of the **Help** button of a multiple-document interface (MDI) child window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 각 속성을 반환 클래스를 의 여러 상태에 대 한는 **도움말** MDI 자식 창에 단추입니다.Each property of the class returns a for a different state of the **Help** button of an MDI child window. ## Examples 다음 코드 예제에는 만드는 방법을 보여 줍니다는 사용 하 여 합니다 반환한는 속성입니다.The following code example demonstrates how to create a with the returned by the property. 이 예제를 실행 하려면 Windows 폼에 붙여 넣습니다.To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. 양식의 처리 이벤트 및 호출 합니다 `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton1` 메서드에서 전달 하는 이벤트 처리 메서드를 `e` 으로 입니다.Handle the form’s event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementWindowMdiHelpButton1` method from the event-handling method, passing `e` as . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#407](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#407)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#407](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#407)]

span.span: A that represents the **Help** button of an MDI child window in the disabled state.
